sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; const BatsmenAnalysis = ({ data, team1, team2 }) => { console.log("BatsmenAnalysis Data:", data); console.log("Team1:", team1); console.log("Team2:", team2); if (!data || data.length === 0) return null; // Separate and sort batsmen by team const team1Batsmen = data .filter((player) => player.battingTeam === team1) .sort((a, b) => b.totalRuns - a.totalRuns) .slice(0, 5); const team2Batsmen = data .filter((player) => player.battingTeam === team2) .sort((a, b) => b.totalRuns - a.totalRuns) .slice(0, 5); console.log("Team1 Batsmen:", team1Batsmen); console.log("Team2 Batsmen:", team2Batsmen); return (
{/* Team 1 Top Batsmen */}

{team1} Top Batsmen

{team1Batsmen.map((player, index) => ( ))}
Rank Batsman Runs Matches SR Avg 4s/6s
{index + 1} {player.batsman} {player.totalRuns} {player.matchesPlayed} {player.strikeRate.toFixed(1)} {player.average.toFixed(1)} {player.fours}/{player.sixes}
{/* Team 2 Top Batsmen */}

{team2} Top Batsmen

{team2Batsmen.map((player, index) => ( ))}
Rank Batsman Runs Matches SR Avg 4s/6s
{index + 1} {player.batsman} {player.totalRuns} {player.matchesPlayed} {player.strikeRate.toFixed(1)} {player.average.toFixed(1)} {player.fours}/{player.sixes}
{/* Summary Statistics */}

Batting Comparison

{team1} Highest Score:{" "} {team1Batsmen[0]?.totalRuns || 0} {" "} by{" "} {team1Batsmen[0]?.batsman || "N/A"}

{team2} Highest Score:{" "} {team2Batsmen[0]?.totalRuns || 0} {" "} by{" "} {team2Batsmen[0]?.batsman || "N/A"}

); }; export default BatsmenAnalysis;
